prompt: Concatenate three ASCII tables input1.txt, input2.txt, and input3.txt into a single output file output.txt
response: stilts tcat ifmt=ascii in=input1.txt in=input2.txt in=input3.txt out=output.txt

prompt: Combine multiple FITS files listed in a file called input.list into a single output file output.fits, using lazy loading
response: stilts tcat in=@input.list out=output.fits lazy=true
error: Error: input.list (No such file or directory)

prompt: Concatenate CSV files input1.csv, input2.csv, input3.csv and add a sequence column called 'TableID' to track which table each row came from
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in='input1.csv input2.csv input3.csv' seqcol=TableID out=output.csv

prompt: Merge all tables from a multi-extension FITS file input.fits into a single table output.fits
response: stilts tcat in=input.fits multi=true out=output.fits
error: Error: No file, URL or command "input.fits"

prompt: Concatenate VOTable files and add a column showing the original file location for each row
response: stilts tcat ifmt=votable in='input1.xml input2.xml input3.xml' loccol=SourceFile out=output.xml

prompt: Combine three ASCII tables, keep only columns RA, DEC, and FLUX from each, and sort the final output by FLUX
response: stilts tcat ifmt=ascii in='input1.txt input2.txt input3.txt' icmd='keepcols "RA DEC FLUX"' ocmd='sort FLUX' out=output.txt

prompt: Concatenate FITS files, enable row counting for better performance, and use lazy loading
response: stilts tcat in=@input.list countrows=true lazy=true out=output.fits
error: Error: input.list (No such file or directory)

prompt: Merge CSV files, filter each input table to keep only rows where MAGNITUDE < 15, then concatenate
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in='input1.csv input2.csv input3.csv' icmd='select "MAGNITUDE<15"' out=output.csv

prompt: Concatenate tables and add both sequence number and unique location identifier columns
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits input3.fits' seqcol=TableNum uloccol=FileID out=output.fits

prompt: Combine multiple VOTable files, keeping all tables from each file, with progress reporting
response: stilts tcat ifmt=votable in='input1.xml input2.xml' multi=true icmd=progress out=output.xml
error: Error: No file, URL or command "input1.xml"

prompt: Concatenate ASCII tables and output only metadata information instead of the actual table
response: stilts tcat ifmt=ascii in='input1.txt input2.txt input3.txt' omode=meta

prompt: Merge FITS files, apply column selection to each input, and add final sorting
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' icmd='keepcols "ID RA DEC"' ocmd='sort ID' out=output.fits

prompt: Concatenate tables from standard input in CSV format
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in=- out=output.csv

prompt: Combine tables and output row count only
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits input3.fits' omode=count

prompt: Concatenate CSV files, rename a column in each input table, then combine
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in='input1.csv input2.csv' icmd='colmeta -name NewName OldName' out=output.csv

prompt: Merge tables with streaming input enabled for better memory usage
response: stilts tcat ifmt=fits in='input1.fits input2.fits' istream=true out=output.fits

prompt: Concatenate tables and calculate statistics on the result
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits input3.fits' omode=stats

prompt: Combine ASCII tables, select top 10 rows by FLUX from each, then sort final result
response: stilts tcat ifmt=ascii in='input1.txt input2.txt' icmd='sorthead 10 FLUX' ocmd='sort FLUX' out=output.txt

prompt: Concatenate FITS tables and output to TOPCAT for interactive viewing
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits input3.fits' omode=topcat

prompt: Merge CSV files with custom output format specification
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in='input1.csv input2.csv' ofmt=fits out=output.fits

prompt: Concatenate tables and discard the output (for testing purposes)
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' omode=discard

prompt: Combine multiple tables with preprocessing commands from an external file
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' icmd=@input.commands out=output.fits
error: Error: input.commands (No such file or directory)

prompt: Concatenate VOTable files and compute checksum of the result
response: stilts tcat ifmt=votable in='input1.xml input2.xml' omode=checksum

prompt: Merge tables with both input preprocessing and output postprocessing
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' icmd='select "MAG<20"' ocmd='addcol -after MAG COLOR "B_MAG-V_MAG"' out=output.fits

prompt: Concatenate ASCII tables using automatic format detection
response: stilts tcat in='input1.dat input2.dat input3.dat' out=output.dat
error:
Error: Can't guess output format for output.dat
    (No handler specified for writing table.
Known formats: jdbc, fits, colfits, votable, fits-healpix, ECSV, parquet, text, ascii, CSV, IPAC, HTML, LaTeX, TST, feather, mirage)
Usage: tcat in=<table> [<table> ...] ifmt=<in-format> multi=true|false
            istream=true|false icmd=<cmds> ocmd=<cmds>
            omode=out|meta|stats|count|checksum|cgi|discard|topcat|samp|plastic|tosql|gui
            out=<out-table> ofmt=<out-format> seqcol=<colname>
            loccol=<colname> uloccol=<colname> lazy=true|false
            countrows=true|false

prompt: Combine tables from system command output
response: stilts tcat ifmt=csv in='<cat input*.csv' out=output.csv

prompt: Concatenate FITS files and export to SQL database
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' omode=tosql out=jdbc:postgresql://localhost/mydb#mytable
error:
Error: Bad value for parameter protocol: null value not allowed
Usage: protocol=<jdbc-protocol>

prompt: Merge tables with multiple preprocessing steps
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits' icmd='select "RA>0"' icmd='colmeta -units degrees RA' out=output.fits

prompt: Concatenate tables and show progress for each input file
response: stilts tcat in='input1.fits input2.fits input3.fits' icmd=progress seqcol=TableIndex out=output.fits

prompt: Combine VOTable files keeping only specific columns based on UCD
response: stilts tcat ifmt=votable in='input1.xml input2.xml' icmd='keepcols "ucd$POS_EQ_RA_MAIN ucd$POS_EQ_DEC_MAIN"' out=output.xml
